BIPI.JK.summary: PT Astrindo Nusantara Infrastruktur Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in mining infrastructure in Indonesia. The company operates through Port services; and Coal Mining and Others segments. It provides coal-mining facilities, including harbors and crushers. The company also operates two ports in South Kalimantan and one port in East Kalimantan. In addition, it engages in the exploration, production, and infrastructure of coal mining; construction and trading activities; and rental of coal harbor and facilities. The company was formerly known as PT Benakat Integra Tbk and changed its name to PT Astrindo Nusantara Infrastruktur Tbk in May 2018. PT Astrindo Nusantara Infrastruktur Tbk was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

CMNP.JK.long_name: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk
CMNP.JK.summary: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, constructs and operates toll roads in Indonesia. It engages in implementing and providing consultancy services in the field of management, investment, information technology and telecommunications, transportation, project development, property management, and real estate; as well as sells product components of highway construction. The company operates the Simpang Susun Waru - Juanda toll road in Surabaya; Depok - Antasari toll road in Jakarta; Soreang - Pasir Koja toll road; Cileunyi - Sumedang - Dawuan Toll Road, and Sumedang Dawuan toll road. It also provides trading, development, procurement, contract, industry, land management, and other services. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in North Jakarta, Indonesia.

J7K.F.long_name: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk
J7K.F.summary: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, constructs and operates toll roads in Indonesia. It engages in implementing and providing consultancy services in the field of management, investment, information technology and telecommunications, transportation, project development, property management, and real estate; as well as sells product components of highway construction. The company operates the Simpang Susun Waru - Juanda toll road in Surabaya; Depok - Antasari toll road in Jakarta; Soreang - Pasir Koja toll road; Cileunyi - Sumedang - Dawuan Toll Road, and Sumedang Dawuan toll road. It also provides trading, development, procurement, contract, industry, land management, and other services. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in North Jakarta, Indonesia.

J9B.F.summary: PT Astrindo Nusantara Infrastruktur Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in mining infrastructure in Indonesia. The company operates through Port services; and Coal Mining and Others segments. It provides coal-mining facilities, including harbors and crushers. The company also operates two ports in South Kalimantan and one port in East Kalimantan. In addition, it engages in the exploration, production, and infrastructure of coal mining; construction and trading activities; and rental of coal harbor and facilities. The company was formerly known as PT Benakat Integra Tbk and changed its name to PT Astrindo Nusantara Infrastruktur Tbk in May 2018. PT Astrindo Nusantara Infrastruktur Tbk was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

META.JK.summary: PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates and manages toll roads in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Toll Road, Water Supply, Energy, and Port. The company also provides trade and construction, port management, clean water supply and waste management, and telecommunication services. In addition, it engages in the renewable energy business. The company was formerly known as PT Metamedia Technologies Tbk and changed its name to PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk in June 2006. PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Metro Pacific Tollways Indonesia.

TEBE.JK.summary: PT Dana Brata Luhur Tbk, a coal logistic company, provides pit to port coal hauling services in Indonesia. The company offers mining infrastructure covering haul roads, provision of stockpile areas, and operation of coal terminals. It also operates a private port for coal loading and blending. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dana Brata Luhur Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Prima Mineral Utama.
